original_text: And behold, one of the people of Israel came and brought a Midianite woman to his family, in the sight of Moses and in the sight of the whole congregation of the people of Israel, while they were weeping in the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 회막 문에서 울 때에 이스라엘 자손 한 사람이 모세와 온 회중의 눈앞에 미디안의 한 여인을 데리고 그의 형제에게로 온지라

sentences.original_text: one of the people of Israel came
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 중 한 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: and brought a Midianite woman to his family,
and in the sight of the whole congregation of the people of Israel,
in the entrance of the tent of meeting.
